Description.Text:
Stylish GAY friendly hotel, right on the seafront in the heart of Brighton's Kemptown and minutes away from the fashionable Lanes shopping district and famous night life.
The hotel offers an array of quality en-suite rooms, many with stunning sea views. From standard doubles to stunning suites which are finished to the highest standards with bespoke furnishings. All rooms are en-suite, have LCD TVs and Tea/Coffee facilities, luxury rooms offer many more facilities. The hotel also features a bar with seafront terrace & basement nightclub open till late.
Hotels friendly staff are there to help you to have a great time.
Breakfast until 10.30am - 12 Noon Checkout. Lunch available from Midday to 5.00pm (excluding Sundays).
On the Brighton seafront, a few minutes from the train station, 30 minutes from Gatwick airport, 1 hour from London

Comfort Double - Comfort Double offers one double bed, compact sized room, rooms have central heating, en-suite facilities and free WiFi internet access
Luxury - Luxury room offers one double bed, larger sized room, rooms have central heating, en-suite facilities, 32in LCD TV, room safe & desk and free WiFi internet access.
Suite - Huge suite offers one king bed, lounge area & bespoke furnishings, rooms have central heating, en-suite facilities with bath, 32in HD LCD TV, safe, fridge & desk and free WiFi internet access. All with panoramic sea views.
